p: Huh7D cells ( 10) were maintained in Dulbecco's modified Eagle's medium (DMEM; Gibco; Thermo Fisher Scientific, Inc.) supplemented with 10% FBS, 100 U/ml penicillin and 100 µg/ml streptomycin maintained at 37°C in a 5% CO 2 incubator. Huh7D cells were induced using inducing medium (DMEM supplemented with 5% FBS, 100 U/ml penicillin, 100 µg/ml streptomycin and 2.5% DMSO) for 24–72 h prior to HBV infection.
